ModMetaData.name: Organic Plasteel
ModMetaData.author: Sixdd
ModMetaData.description:
It is now possible to create Plasteel by combining Plastic and Steel at an Electric Smelter.
Items added: Starch - Made at a stove or electric stove Plastic - Made at an electric smelter (Can be purchased and used as construction material)
Task Added in Electric Smelter: Make Starch -> 5 Potatoes = 1 Starch Make Plastic -> 1 Starch = 1 Plastic Make Plasteel -> 5 Plastic + 1 Steel = 1 Plasteel\n\n
